snippet: Khadija Ismayilova was sentenced Tuesday to 7 1/2 years in prison on charges including embezzlement and tax evasion.
abstract: Baku court sentences Azerbaijani investigative journalist Khadija Ismayilova to 7 1/2 years in prison for embezzlement, tax evasion and other charges; jailing of Izmayilova, known for questioning wealth sources of Pres Ilham Aliyev and his family, draws outcry from rights activists.
lead_paragraph: Khadija Ismayilova was sentenced Tuesday to 7 1/2 years in prison on charges including embezzlement and tax evasion.

headline.main: Azerbaijan: Journalist Critical of Leader Is Sentenced to 7 1/2 Years in Prison
headline.print_headline: Europe; Azerbaijan: Journalist Critical of Leader Is Sentenced to 7 1/2 Years in Prison
